about_the_game:
▼ABOUT THIS GAME
This is a tale of revenge for a girl whose hands and feet were stolen by a demon. a popular adventure game serialized in Game Magazine from April 2016 to April 2023 is now available on Steam. You can enjoy the adventure part of the story of the girl's epic revenge and the game part of combat and puzzle action.

*Season 1-7 are packaged on Steam, and the interlude stories Season 3.5 and Season 8 onward are available for purchase as downloadable content. Season 1 is available in the demo version.

▼STORY
Noel, whose parents are professional pianists, is in despair when she fails to win a piano competition held in Laplace. She is told by the mayor of the city, Mr. Burrows, that there were some irregularities in the selection process, and believing him, she heads for the abandoned building designated. In order to become the real winner, he summons the great demon Caron and makes a contract with him, but soon after, he loses his body as compensation.
Noel is on the verge of death, but Caron, who is still angry at being used by Burrows, saves him and offers him revenge against Burrows. The two form a cooperative relationship and gradually catch up with Burrows while confronting one crisis after another.

▼Season1
Asked to perform at a commemorative ceremony in Laplace.
It is the highest honor, goal, and aspiration of the young players in Laplace.

While everyone was nervously waiting for the announcement, there was one girl, Noel, who seemed to be at ease. She was sure of it.
She was sure that she would be the winner of this year's piano competition.

However, her confidence turned to despair.
It was her best friend, Jillian, who had won the competition.

In her desperation, Burrows, the mayor of Laplace, offers Noel a deal.
Believing his words, Noel heads for the promised place, only to find the devil lurking there.
